text: 9|5|Atahpara nisid'dha masa [1] atibahita hale musarikaderake yekhane pabe hatya kara [2], taderake pakara'o kara [3], abarodha kara ebam pratyeka ghamtite tadera jan'ya omt pete thaka; kintu yadi tara ta'obah kare, salata kayema kare ebam yakata deya [4] tabe tadera patha chere da'o [5]; niscaya allahâ€Œ atisaya ksamasila, parama dayalu [6].
